card.name: Aether Mutation
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.

card.name: Ana Disciple
card.property: {U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. {B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The blessings of Gaea alone are no longer enough."

card.name: Ana Sanctuary
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a blue or black permanent, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If you control a blue permanent and a black permanent, that creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn instead.

card.name: Anavolver
card.property: Kicker {1}{U} and/or {B} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} and/or {B} as you cast this spell.) If Anavolver was kicked with its {1}{U} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with flying. If Anavolver was kicked with its {B} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with "Pay 3 life: Regenerate Anavolver."

card.name: Angelfire Crusader
card.property: {R}: Angelfire Crusader gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing burns hotter than the fires of holy rage.

card.name: Battlefield Forge
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Bloodfire Colossus
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Colossus: Bloodfire Colossus deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It took all its strength to contain the fire within.

card.name: Bloodfire Dwarf
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Dwarf: Bloodfire Dwarf deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For them, the only honorable death is one that leaves a crater.

card.name: Bloodfire Infusion
card.property: Enchant creature you control {R}, Sacrifice enchanted creature: Bloodfire Infusion deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to each creature.

card.name: Bloodfire Kavu
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Kavu: Bloodfire Kavu deals 2 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Heart of fire, blood of lava, teeth of stone.

card.name: Bog Gnarr
card.property: Whenever a player casts a black spell, Bog Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all of Dominaria's defenders were nourished by the light.

card.name: Brass Herald
card.property: As Brass Herald enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. When Brass Herald enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all creature cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.

card.name: Captain's Maneuver
card.property: The next X damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn is dealt to another target creature or player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sisay discovered that the mirrored hull of the Weatherlight could be used as a defensive weapon.

card.name: Caves of Koilos
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Caves of Koilos deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Ceta Disciple
card.property: {R}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. {G}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sea holds all that you need. You simply must know how to ask for it."

card.name: Ceta Sanctuary
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a red or green permanent, draw a card, then discard a card. If you control a red permanent and a green permanent, instead draw two cards, then discard a card.

card.name: Cetavolver
card.property: Kicker {1}{R} and/or {G} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} and/or {G} as you cast this spell.) If Cetavolver was kicked with its {1}{R} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with first strike. If Cetavolver was kicked with its {G} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with trample.

card.name: Coalition Flag
card.property: Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature is a Flagbearer. While choosing targets as part of casting a spell or activating an ability, your opponents must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.

card.name: Coalition Honor Guard
card.property: While choosing targets as part of casting a spell or activating an ability, your opponents must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Giving little thought to their own defense, they carried the flag that united their army.

card.name: Coastal Drake
card.property: Flying {1}{U}, {T}: Return target Kavu to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the kavu emerged from their ancient nests, food chains long dormant became vibrant again.

card.name: Consume Strength
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Multani's troops invaded Urborg, the decay of the swamp became a feast for the living.

card.name: Cromat

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: {W} {B}: Destroy target creature blocking or blocked by Cromat. {U}{R}: Cromat gains flying until end of turn. {B}{G}: Regenerate Cromat. {R}{W}: Cromat gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {G}{U}: Put Cromat on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Dead Ringers
card.property: Destroy two target nonblack creatures unless either one is a color the other isn't. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beautiful, isn't it?" crowed Crovax. "They fought together. Now they will die together."

card.name: Death Grasp
card.property: Death Grasp deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Yawgmoth's greatest joy came from watching one hero defeat another.

card.name: Death Mutation
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.

card.name: Dega Disciple
card.property: {B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn. {R}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no true equity of power. There is only more and less."

card.name: Dega Sanctuary
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a black or red permanent, you gain 2 life. If you control a black permanent and a red permanent, you gain 4 life instead.

card.name: Degavolver
card.property: Kicker {1}{B} and/or {R} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} and/or {R} as you cast this spell.) If Degavolver was kicked with its {1}{B} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with "Pay 3 life: Regenerate Degavolver." If Degavolver was kicked with its {R} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with first strike.

card.name: Desolation Angel
card.property: Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you cast this spell.) Flying When Desolation Angel enters the battlefield, destroy all lands you control. If it was kicked, destroy all lands instead.

card.name: Desolation Giant
card.property: Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you cast this spell.) When Desolation Giant enters the battlefield, destroy all other creatures you control. If it was kicked, destroy all other creatures instead.

card.name: Diversionary Tactics
card.property: Tap two untapped creatures you control: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's the oldest trick in the book," said Guff. "And I ought to know—I wrote it."

card.name: Divine Light
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Phyrexia is an unforgiving place, and I am an angry lord in an unforgiving mood."—Lord Windgrace

card.name: Dodecapod
card.property: If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Dodecapod, put it onto the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it instead of putting it into your graveyard.

card.name: Dragon Arch
card.property: {2}, {T}: You may put a multicolored creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In their hunger for the arch's power, mages often forget that it only makes dragons easier to summon. It doesn't make them easier to control.

card.name: Dwarven Landslide
card.property: Kicker—{2}{R}, Sacrifice a land. (You may pay {2}{R} and sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.) Destroy target land. If Dwarven Landslide was kicked, destroy another target land.

card.name: Dwarven Patrol
card.property: Dwarven Patrol doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever you cast a nonred spell, untap Dwarven Patrol.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dwarves never worry about who watches their backs.

card.name: Ebony Treefolk
card.property: {B} {G}: Ebony Treefolk gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its roots are equally happy to drink the water of a clear stream or the oily blood of a Phyrexian warrior.

card.name: Emblazoned Golem
card.property: Kicker {X} (You may pay an additional {X} as you cast this spell.) Spend only colored mana on X. No more than one mana of each color may be spent this way. If Emblazoned Golem was kicked, it enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Enlistment Officer
card.property: First strike When Enlistment Officer enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Soldier cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Evasive Action
card.property: Domain — Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Effective use of terrain is a lesson good commanders learn quickly.

card.name: False Dawn
card.property: Until end of turn, spells and abilities you control that would add colored mana to your mana pool add that much white mana instead. Until end of turn, you may spend white mana as though it were mana of any color. Draw a card.

card.name: Fervent Charge
card.property: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Crovax was nearly buried beneath the weight of his opponents.

card.name: Fire // Ice
card.property: Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players. // Tap target permanent. Draw a card.

alternate.name: Fire
alternate.property: Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.

alternate.name: Ice
alternate.property: Tap target permanent. Draw a card.

card.name: Flowstone Charger
card.property: Whenever Flowstone Charger attacks, it gets +3/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A mane of flowstone and a mien of fury.

card.name: Foul Presence
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and has "{T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Phyrexians have one word that means both "evolution" and "pain."

card.name: Fungal Shambler
card.property: Trample Whenever Fungal Shambler deals damage to an opponent, you draw a card and that opponent discards a card.

card.name: Gaea's Balance
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Gaea's Balance, sacrifice five lands. Search your library for a land card of each basic land type and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Gaea's Skyfolk
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The grace of the forest and the spirit of the sea.

card.name: Gerrard Capashen
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in target opponent's hand. {3}{W}: Tap target creature. Activate this ability only if Gerrard Capashen is attacking.

card.name: Gerrard's Verdict
card.property: Target player discards two cards. You gain 3 life for each land card discarded this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A heart of light and a soul of darkness cannot coexist.

card.name: Glade Gnarr
card.property: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, Glade Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Long thought merely a legend, the appearance of the gnarr was seen by the defenders as a sign of good luck.

card.name: Goblin Legionnaire
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Goblin Legionnaire deals 2 damage to target creature or player. {W}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Goblin Ringleader
card.property: Haste When Goblin Ringleader enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Goblin Trenches
card.property: {2}, Sacrifice a land: Create two 1/1 red and white Goblin Soldier creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ground rose and formed into thousands of tiny warriors. This fight was far from over.

card.name: Grave Defiler
card.property: When Grave Defiler enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Zombie cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. {1}{B}: Regenerate Grave Defiler.

card.name: Guided Passage
card.property: Reveal the cards in your library. An opponent chooses from among them a creature card, a land card, and a noncreature, nonland card. You put the chosen cards into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Haunted Angel
card.property: Flying When Haunted Angel dies, exile Haunted Angel and each other player creates a 3/3 black Angel creature token with flying.

card.name: Helionaut
card.property: Flying {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hope kept the defenders aloft, but only courage kept them in the fight.

card.name: Ice Cave
card.property: Whenever a player casts a spell, any other player may pay that spell's mana cost. If a player does, counter the spell. (Mana cost includes color.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the oppresive cold of the cave could not temper Eladamri's ire.

card.name: Illuminate
card.property: Kicker {2}{R} and/or {3}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{R} and/or {3}{U} as you cast this spell.) Illuminate deals X damage to target creature. If Illuminate was kicked with its {2}{R} kicker, it deals X damage to that creature's controller. If Illuminate was kicked with its {3}{U} kicker, you draw X cards.

card.name: Illusion // Reality

alternate.name: Illusion
alternate.property: Target spell or permanent becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Index
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let's see . . . Mercadia, mercenary, merfolk . . . you know, I really need a better filing system."

card.name: Jaded Response
card.property: Counter target spell if it shares a color with a creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Calm down everyone; it's nothing we haven't seen before."—Sisay

card.name: Jilt
card.property: Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.) Return target creature to its owner's hand. If Jilt was kicked, it deals 2 damage to another target creature.

card.name: Jungle Barrier
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Jungle Barrier enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A massive pull of mana caused all of Dominaria to pause—Multani had transplanted Yavimaya to Urborg's edge.

card.name: Kavu Glider
card.property: {W}: Kavu Glider gets +0/+1 until end of turn. {U}: Kavu Glider gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Kavu Howler
card.property: When Kavu Howler enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Kavu cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Kavu Mauler
card.property: Trample Whenever Kavu Mauler attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other attacking Kavu.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the kavu, all Phyrexians are merely crunchy snacks.

card.name: Last Caress
card.property: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Draw a card.

card.name: Last Stand

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: Target opponent loses 2 life for each Swamp you control. Last Stand deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control. Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token for each Forest you control. You gain 2 life for each Plains you control. Draw a card for each Island you control, then discard that many cards.

card.name: Lay of the Land
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Victory favors neither the righteous nor the wicked. It favors the prepared.

card.name: Legacy Weapon
Life // Death

alternate.name: Life
alternate.property: All lands you control become 1/1 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.

alternate.name: Death
alternate.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

card.name: Lightning Angel
card.property: Flying, vigilance, haste

card.name: Living Airship
card.property: Flying {2}{G}: Regenerate Living Airship.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ship has a crew of three: the pilot, the gunner, and the ship itself.

card.name: Llanowar Dead
card.property: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just as leaves fall from the branches of a living tree, so too do the dead leave the elfhame.

card.name: Llanowar Wastes
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool. Llanowar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Manacles of Decay
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack. {B}: Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. {R}: Enchanted creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Martyrs' Tomb
card.property: Pay 2 life: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Honor the brave who fought,Honor the dead who fell,Honor the world they saved.—Memorial inscription

card.name: Mask of Intolerance
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if there are four or more basic land types among lands that player controls, Mask of Intolerance deals 3 damage to him or her.

card.name: Mind Extraction
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Mind Extraction, sacrifice a creature. Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards of each of the sacrificed creature's colors.

card.name: Minotaur Illusionist
Minotaur Tactician
card.property: Haste Minotaur Tactician gets +1/+1 as long as you control a white creature. Minotaur Tactician gets +1/+1 as long as you control a blue creature.

card.name: Mournful Zombie
card.property: {W}, {T}: Target player gains 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Treated with a powerful mix of herbs and potions, its wrappings have a remarkable preservative effect, even for the living.

card.name: Mystic Snake
card.property: Flash When Mystic Snake enters the battlefield, counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its fangs are in your flesh before its hiss leaves your ears.

card.name: Necra Disciple
card.property: {G}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Necra Sanctuary
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a green or white permanent, target player loses 1 life. If you control a green permanent and a white permanent, that player loses 3 life instead.

card.name: Necravolver
card.property: Kicker {1}{G} and/or {W} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} and/or {W} as you cast this spell.) If Necravolver was kicked with its {1}{G} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with trample. If Necravolver was kicked with its {W} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with "Whenever Necravolver deals damage, you gain that much life."

card.name: Night // Day

alternate.name: Night
alternate.property: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

alternate.name: Day
alternate.property: Creatures target player controls get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Order // Chaos
Orim's Thunder
card.property: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If Orim's Thunder was kicked, it deals damage equal to that permanent's converted mana cost to target creature.

card.name: Overgrown Estate
card.property: Sacrifice a land: You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The decay of Crovax's ancestral home matched the state of his soul.

card.name: Penumbra Bobcat
card.property: When Penumbra Bobcat dies, create a 2/1 black Cat creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This cat has two lives and it's hunting for more.

card.name: Penumbra Kavu
card.property: When Penumbra Kavu dies, create a 3/3 black Kavu creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These kavu are so stubborn they even refuse to die."—Tahngarth

card.name: Penumbra Wurm
card.property: Trample When Penumbra Wurm dies, create a 6/6 black Wurm creature token with trample.

card.name: Pernicious Deed
card.property: {X}, Sacrifice Pernicious Deed: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with converted mana cost X or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yawgmoth," Freyalise whispered as she set the bomb, "now you will pay for your treachery."

card.name: Phyrexian Arena
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An audience of one with the malice of thousands.

card.name: Phyrexian Gargantua
card.property: When Phyrexian Gargantua enters the battlefield, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Other Phyrexians have nightmares about the gargantua.

card.name: Phyrexian Rager
card.property: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It takes no prisoners, but it keeps the choicest bits for Phyrexia.

card.name: Planar Despair
card.property: Domain — All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All of Dominaria recoiled as Yawgmoth and his retainers arrived.

card.name: Powerstone Minefield
card.property: Whenever a creature attacks or blocks, Powerstone Minefield deals 2 damage to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have fought this far and lost too much. We will not turn back."—Grizzlegom

card.name: Prophetic Bolt
card.property: Prophetic Bolt deals 4 damage to target creature or player. Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Putrid Warrior
card.property: Whenever Putrid Warrior deals damage, choose one — • Each player loses 1 life. • Each player gains 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not like it," said Grizzlegom, "but I will take every soldier I can get."

card.name: Quagmire Druid
card.property: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the druids had devoted their lives to preserving Dominaria, so did they devote their deaths.

card.name: Quicksilver Dagger
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player. You draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dwarves call their quicksilver techniques "improvisational weaponsmithing."

card.name: Raka Disciple
card.property: {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. {U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Raka Sanctuary
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a white or blue permanent, Raka Sanctuary deals 1 damage to target creature. If you control a white permanent and a blue permanent, Raka Sanctuary deals 3 damage to that creature instead.

card.name: Rakavolver
card.property: Kicker {1}{W} and/or {U} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} and/or {U} as you cast this spell.) If Rakavolver was kicked with its {1}{W} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with "Whenever Rakavolver deals damage, you gain that much life." If Rakavolver was kicked with its {U} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with flying.

card.name: Razorfin Hunter
card.property: {T}: Razorfin Hunter deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one knew if they'd been lurking under the sea all along, or if they'd been created by the Phyrexian overlay.

card.name: Reef Shaman
card.property: {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With one gesture, she can render a thousand years of navigational charts obsolete.

card.name: Savage Gorilla
card.property: {U} {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Savage Gorilla: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These omnivorous gorillas have no qualms about a diet composed of equal parts fruit and Phyrexians.

card.name: Shield of Duty and Reason
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from green and from blue.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The duty: to defend. The reason: to survive.

card.name: Shimmering Mirage
card.property: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oh, is that all you need? Why didn't you just say so?"—Reef shaman

card.name: Shivan Reef
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Smash
card.property: Destroy target artifact. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They're ugly, and they're in my way."—Tahngarth

card.name: Soul Link
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life. Whenever enchanted creature is dealt damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They danced like puppets to a tune only Yawgmoth could hear.

card.name: Spectral Lynx
card.property: Protection from green {B}: Regenerate Spectral Lynx.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A shadowy version of its corporeal cousin, this lynx hunts souls, not meals.

card.name: Spiritmonger
card.property: Whenever Spiritmonger deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Spiritmonger. {B}: Regenerate Spiritmonger. {G}: Spiritmonger becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Squee's Embrace
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. When enchanted creature dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Squee's Revenge
card.property: Choose a number. Flip a coin that many times or until you lose a flip, whichever comes first. If you win all the flips, draw two cards for each flip.

card.name: Standard Bearer
card.property: While choosing targets as part of casting a spell or activating an ability, your opponents must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The standard was a rallying point for the army and a target for the enemy.

card.name: Strength of Night
card.property: Kicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} as you cast this spell.) Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If Strength of Night was kicked, Zombie creatures you control get an additional +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Suffocating Blast
card.property: Counter target spell and Suffocating Blast deals 3 damage to target creature.

card.name: Suppress
card.property: Target player exiles all cards from his or her hand face down. At the beginning of the end step of that player's next turn, that player returns those cards to his or her hand.

card.name: Sylvan Messenger
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.) When Sylvan Messenger enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Symbiotic Deployment
card.property: Skip your draw step. {1}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You know your orders. I know your hearts. Now the stronghold will know defeat."—Eladamri

card.name: Tahngarth's Glare
card.property: Look at the top three cards of target opponent's library, then put them back in any order. That player looks at the top three cards of your library, then puts them back in any order.

card.name: Temporal Spring
card.property: Put target permanent on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One splash of the spring's water knocks you clear into last week.

card.name: Tidal Courier
card.property: When Tidal Courier enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Merfolk cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. {3}{U}: Tidal Courier gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Tranquil Path
card.property: Destroy all enchantments. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Freyalise bought the planeswalkers the time they needed by clearing a path through the misshapen hell of Phyrexia.

card.name: Tundra Kavu
card.property: {T}: Target land becomes a Plains or an Island until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A cross between a jaguar and an armadillo.

card.name: Unnatural Selection
card.property: {1}: Choose a creature type other than Wall. Target creature becomes that type until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What nature makes, magic can modify.

card.name: Urborg Elf
card.property: {T}: Add {G}, {U}, or {B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves of Urborg are as deadly and capricious as the swamp itself.

card.name: Urborg Uprising
card.property: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Urborg, few things are less permanent than death.

card.name: Vindicate
card.property: Destroy target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't mourn for me. This is my destiny."—Gerrard

card.name: Vodalian Mystic
card.property: {T}: Target instant or sorcery spell becomes the color of your choice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes when I look at the ocean, I could swear it changes colors."—Sisay

card.name: Whirlpool Drake
card.property: Flying When Whirlpool Drake enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards. When Whirlpool Drake dies, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.

card.name: Whirlpool Rider
card.property: When Whirlpool Rider enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where the wind meets the water, change is inevitable.

card.name: Whirlpool Warrior
card.property: When Whirlpool Warrior enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards. {R}, Sacrifice Whirlpool Warrior: Each player shuffles the cards from his or her hand into his or her library, then draws that many cards.

card.name: Wild Research
Yavimaya Coast
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Yavimaya's Embrace
card.property: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.

card.name: Zombie Boa
card.property: {1} {B}: Choose a color. Whenever Zombie Boa becomes blocked by a creature of that color this turn, destroy that creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It doesn't need to feed, but still it hungers.
